DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this actual use study is to simulate the over the counter use of atorvastatin calcium 10 mg.
DOC.brief_title: Actual Use Trial of Atorvastatin Calcium 10 mg
DOC.criteria: At least 18 years of age (19 in Alabama). Provide written informed consent. Never participated in a study about cholesterol medicines. Females subjects who are pregnant or breastfeeding. Subjects with active liver disease. Subjects taking cyclosporine. Subjects with a known allergy to atorvastatin calcium.
